import React from 'react' import './topbar.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Topbar() { const user = true; // if false the below conditions will work return (
  • HOME
  • ABOUT
  • CONTACT
  • WRITE
  • SETTINGS
  • { user && LOGOUT }
    { user ? : <>
  • LOGIN
  • REGISTER
    • }
) } export default Topbar
